summary: A woman must set things right, when a mysterious lady named Noel grants her 12 wishes and they magically come true for Christmas.
cast: Elisa Donovan|Gabrielle Carteris|Fred Willard|David O'Donnell|Sarah Thompson|Michael Gross|Chonda Pierce|Mo Gaffney|Michael Bergin|Lynn Milano|Marliss Amiea|Caia Coley|Ed Halligan|Ariana Brown|Al Chavez|Ariana George|Michael Ciminera|Richard Gnolfo|Kimberlee Kidd|Anne Montavon|Ksenia Lauren|Ayden Marie Vargas|Ningning Deng|Polina Pavlovsky Herrera|Judy Brooking|Dan Brooking|Christine Lucero Benson|Doreen Lucero Waack|Peter Waack|Carole Maldonado
title: Doce deseos de Navidad
